source.name: Monstrous Compendium Vol. 2: Dragonlance Creatures
source.author: F. Wesley Schneider, Makenzie De Armas, Ron Lundeen, Jeremy Crawford
source.description: This bestiary provides game statistics and lore for eleven monsters that, while linked to the fantastical and war-gripped Dragonlance setting, are suitable for any Dungeons & Dragons campaign.
